sentence.Network_en: Among the leaders he knew well were Mahatma Gandhi and Jawaharlal Nehru.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他所熟知的外国领导人中,有马哈特马·甘地,贾瓦哈拉尔·尼赫鲁二位.

sentence.Network_en: At this time, the Mahatma II is also being disbanded.
sentence.Network_cn: 此时, Mahatma二世也正被驱散.
